title: Miguel’s Favorite Products, Rides, and Experiences of 2024
content:
As 2024 draws to a close, Miguel finds himself reflecting on a year filled with new challenges, growth, and lessons learned. In this video, he talks about his favorite new products for the year…

Please, if you enjoy these videos, hit the subscribe button below! If we hit 10k subscribers, John will do a gravel race. If we don’t, Miguel has to shave his mustache!
